name: carousell_scraper
description: Scrape listings from carousell and message using telegram bots

scripts.sendToLambda: npm run zip && npm run uploadConfig && aws s3 cp function.zip s3://carousell-scraper-bucket && rm function.zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name carousell-scraper --s3-bucket carousell-scraper-bucket --s3-key function.zip
